mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GBOARD (GBNO, GNO, MEMBERID , TITLE, CONTENT, GBCATEID) VALUES (GBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{gno}, #{memberid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{gbcateid})
mapper.select: select GB.GNO, GB.GBNO, MR.NAME, GC.GBCATENAME, TO_CHAR(GB.GBREGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI AM') AS GBREGDATE, GB.TITLE, GB.CONTENT from GBOARD GB join GBCATE GC on GB.GBCATEID = GC.GBCATEID join MEMBER MR on MR.MEMBERID = GB.MEMBERID WHERE GB.GNO = #{gno}

select GB.GBNO, MR.NAME, GC.GBCATENAME, TO_CHAR(GB.GBREGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI AM') AS GBREGDATE, GB.TITLE, GB.CONTENT from GBOARD GB join GBCATE GC on GB.GBCATEID = GC.GBCATEID join MEMBER MR on MR.MEMBERID = GB.MEMBERID where GB.GNO = #{gno}

select MR.MEMBERID, GB.GNO, GB.GBNO, MR.NAME, GC.GBCATENAME, TO_CHAR(GB.GBREGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI AM') AS GBREGDATE, GB.TITLE, GB.CONTENT from GBOARD GB join GBCATE GC on GB.GBCATEID = GC.GBCATEID join MEMBER MR on MR.MEMBERID = GB.MEMBERID where GB.GBNO = #{gbno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gbreply(replyid, MEMBERID, GNO, GBNO, CONTENT) VALUES ( GBREPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberid}, #{gno}, #{gbno}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT MR.MEMBERID, GR.REPLYID, MR.NAME, GR.CONTENT, GR.GBREPLYDATE FROM GBREPLY GR join MEMBER MR on GR.memberid = MR.memberid WHERE GR.GBNO = #{gbno} AND GR.GNO = #{gno} AND GR.MEMBERID = #{memberid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GBREPLY WHERE REPLYID = #{replyid} AND MEMBERID = #{memberid}
